title: Ash vs Evil Dead Season 3 Episode 4 Review
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: I really enjoy this season so far MaryGirl. I think personally i might end up liking season 2 a bit more but hey..........it's Ash VS Evil Dead ;) !!
Did you see the new ahs8 news!? Ryan confirmed Kathy bates is back and she’s a lead with Sarah and Evan. And he called “AHS: Radioactive” an interesting idea

I think that Pablo is going to have a Bruce Banner/Hulk and Dr.Jekyll/Mr.Hyde situation where he will be abled to turn into a deadite, but be abled to turn back into powerful vagina, Pablo. Remember in The Evil Dead 2: Ash turned into a deadite temporarily. So that's in The Evil Dead mythology and rules. Plus, being physically connected to the book, Pablo probably possesses supernatural powers that able him to transform. Or maybe not.
description:
My review of Ash vs Evil Dead Season 3, Episode 4, Unfinished Business a.k.a. the Best Show on Television. Available on the STARZ channel.
